title: Tails
post_body: Most worthwhile things in life have long tails. Compound interest, relationships, and opportunities all have long tails. Such things progress painfully slowly at their outset, and only after long stretches of time do they mature and yield massive outsized returns.

title: Phony Data Generator
post_body: It would be great if tools could populate phony data using just a topic field, a mood value, and a writing level.

title: Code Can Challenge You
post_body: Sometimes code can be challenging. Other times it's easy. I wouldn't call it recreation, but I would call it work.
